rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name! It’s great to have you here.
rows.text:
This is your space to:
* Pause and reflect
* Take time for yourself
* Recognise the importance of close family relationships
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.family_relation.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn about attachment and bonding with your child.
rows.text:
We will:
* Explore parenting goals and factors that facilitate the achievement of these goals
* Explore parents’ current beliefs and practices regarding parent – child interaction
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.current_pract.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn about attachment and bonding with your child.
rows.text:
We will learn about:
* The basic developmental needs and behaviors of children 0 – 17 years.
* The importance of the father’s supportiveness during pregnancy and post-birth.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.child_dev.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn about attachment and bonding with your child.
rows.text:
We will learn about:
* Reflecting upon the influences your parents had on you while you were growing up.
* Building on your parents’ positive influences, and avoid repeating the negative influences in your own parenting role.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.parent_childhood.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn respectability and good behavior
rows.text:
We will:
* Discuss positive parent-child interaction to improve discipline and respectability
* Explore different styles of parenting and demonstrate the one which promotes positive relationships and respectability.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.positive_parenting.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn about gendered relationships and power.
rows.text:
We will:
* Reflect upon how gender norms can be harmful to women and men or girls and boys. 
* Increase the awareness of gendered power differences within the family/society. learn about how unequal treatment affects relationships, especially between couples, other family members, or different classes of people in society) 
* Encourage men to commit to positive, acceptable notions of ‘being a man.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.gender_power.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn about parental conflict.
rows.text:
We will:
* Reflect on our own experiences of partner conflict.
* Discuss the consequences of experiencing and witnessing spousal conflict.
* Envision intimate relationships based on respect.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.impact_conflict.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn about sharing child care responsibility.
rows.text:
We will:
* Reflect on the time men and women dedicated to caring for and shaping their future.
* Identify how men and women can be more involved in family life
* Promote reflection and increase awareness about gender differences in terms of caregiving and caring relationships.
* Improve men’s self–confidence and efficacy in caregiving.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.sharing_care.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn about parental conflict.
rows.text:
In this session we will learn about:
* How excessive drinking affects family relationships and children.
* How to help a partner reduce alcohol consumption and other socially unacceptable behavior.
* Discuss what constitutes a healthy marriage and sexuality and the importance of healthy communication in marriage.
* Importance of father’s supportiveness during pregnancy and after birth.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.healthy_relation.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. PfR is here to support parents, raise well-behaved children, and be respectful parents.
rows.text:
Thank you for participating in the first nine sessions of the PfR program.

In this session, we will:
* Reflect on all the previous sessions
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.session_review.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn respectability and good behavior
rows.text:
In this session we will learn about:
* The aspects of parent-child relationships
* Alternative and positive ways of supporting good behavior and discouraging bad behavior
* Effective approaches for managing anger and disappointment
* How to positively and sensitively engage with our children to promote respect
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.discipline.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn respectability and good behavior
rows.text:
In this session, we will:
* Encourage both parent and child to be accountable for the child’s education.
* Explore ways to increase parents’ involvement in their child’s schooling and interaction with teachers.
* Encourage children to achieve through education.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.education.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn respectability and good behavior
rows.text:
In this session we will:
* Understand how gendered expectations affect the lives of women and men, and girls and boys
* Identify discriminatory or unequal gender norms and practices
* Suggest innovative ideas and methods for modifying discriminatory gender norms
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.education.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn respectability and good behavior
rows.text:
In this session, we will learn about:
* Exploring long-term goals for preventing sexual abuse and early sex.
* Nurturvalues in children for preventing sexual violence.
* Facilitating healthy communication between parents and children about sexuality.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.prevent_abuse.title

rows.intro_text: Welcome @fields.user_name. We will learn about parental conflict.
rows.text:
In this session, we will:
* To discuss constructive ways of sharing information to avoid violent situations in relationships.
* To develop participants' skills in expressing personal needs and feelings and in listening reflectively and empathetically.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.reduce_conflict.title

rows.text:
In this session, we will:
* Reflect on the participant’s experience of the programme.
* Reinforce commitment to positive, more equitable, and respectful parenting.
* Encourage continued meetings after the formal ending of the programme.
rows.title: Introduction to @data.topic.conclusion.title
